General.Name: Guangdong South New Media Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Southern New Media Co., Ltd. provides IPTV, internet audio-visual, and content copyright services in China. The company offers video, music, education, games, life, and other various content and related services. It also provides internet mainstream media channels, such as TV and cable TV services, as well as audio-visual value-added services to household users. Guangdong Southern New Media Co., Ltd. was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

2.Name: Mr. Bing  Wang
2.Title: VP & Dean of Industrial Research Institute
